llm_res.rule: The `allowance` function should return the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from an owner.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
The `transfer` and `transferFrom` functions should return a boolean value indicating success.
